Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Sheet to Contacts app

Complete Next.js 14 app that converts spreadsheets to phone contacts (VCF format).

Features:
- Drag & drop file upload (Excel, CSV)
- Google Sheets URL import
- Auto-detect columns (name, phone, email, company, notes)
- Manual column mapping
- Contact preview before export
- VCF/vCard generation
- QR code for mobile scanning
- Beautiful responsive UI with dark mode
- TypeScript + Tailwind CSS
